review: Works extremely well with my iPad and iPhones. Love the Airplay features. Set up took me under 5 minutes. We use the Netflix features daily. It would be even better if Apple and Amazon get together and approve use of Amazon prime videos with the Apple TV.

review: This device is really worth getting if you have an iPhone or iPad. The remote that comes with it is okay but the device really shines when paired with an iOS device using the remote app. The YouTube app on this is great and so is the music application (which I have paired with iTunes match).If you don't use iOS devices you might want to consider a Roku.
author: JS

review: I was disappointed because I am unable to directly stream video from my macbook air through the apple tv (wirelessly), which i was told by an apple tech at a store that "yes that is how it works"....hello tech lady, you can stream "audio via iTunes" but anything visual requires a separate HDMI cord from your computer to the tv which is what I was trying to avoid in the first place. Since ITUNES competes with AMAZON and HBOGO. You are unable to have those options either ....However the "airplay" works great using my macbook or IPhone as remotes for certain HULU or NETLFIX shows !! There are other amazing options with being able to transfer data wirelessly (everybody hates cords).  As long as you understand what your buying it can be a great addition to any entertainment center.
author: Brett

review: I purchased this product primarily for the purpose of hbo go streaming. Although hbo go does not have a standalone apple tv app yet I found it to work very well with my iPad. It does not freeze at all and streaming hbo go and Netflix is so smooth. It never buffers. The interface is also very well layed out and easy to use. I also own a roku hd which has the standalone hbo go but constantly locks up and has choppy streaming. The only thing better about the roku is that it has more apps/ channels. Hopefully Apple TV will gain more channels such as amazon prime, showtime, and starz in the future
